overview.tax_residency_rules: Determined by ordinary residence, physical presence, and domicile.
overview.tax_filing_frequency: Annually on May 7 (extended to July 7 for individuals).

personal_income_tax.exemptions: First $14,000 of income is tax-free for residents.
personal_income_tax.social_security: 3% ACC levy included in PAYE (Accident Compensation Corporation).

corporate_tax.small_business_rate: 10.5% on the first $500,000 of taxable income for 3 years of incorporation.

withholding_taxes.dividends: 15% (can be reduced by double tax agreements).

capital_gains_tax.rate: Taxed as ordinary income at progressive rates.
capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Some exemptions apply, such as for the sale of a primary residence.

digital_nomad_visa.available: No, but a visitor's visa can be obtained for up to 3 months.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.

additional_notes.political_risks: Stable and transparent tax system with low political risk.
additional_notes.economic_stability: Strong and stable economy with a stable currency.
additional_notes.legal_system: Robust and efficient legal system with independent judiciary.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 1st in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
